mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT a.droffline_devnum) from iot_realoffline a,iot_devicerole b where a.droffline_devnum = b.devrole_devnum and b.devrole_roleid IN
#{item}

select a.*, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'离线' ALARM_TYPE from iot_realoffline a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.droffline_devnum = b.di_serialnum and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id order by a.droffline_devreceivetime desc

select a.*, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'离线' ALARM_TYPE from iot_hisoffline a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.dhoffline_devnum = b.di_serialnum and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id AND a.dhoffline_devreceivetime BETWEEN to_date(#{sStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{sEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by a.dhoffline_devreceivetime desc
